#include "CTreeGraphModel.h"

Detailed Description

Author: Bob Buehler, Matt Dissinger, Kyle Owen

Compiler: Windows: MinGW / Linux: GNU G++

Project: GNAT

Description: This file contains the definition of the CTreeGraphModel class which is a wrapper for the CTreeGraph class. It is designed to allow for notification of data modification by requiring that all data modification be done through this class.
